p.s: In his speech, given at COP26 World Leaders Summit Opening Ceremony on 1 November 2021 in Glasgow, Boris Johnson adresses the World Leadersworld leaders, Journalistjournalist and Mediamedia and the whole world populationn with the important topic of the climate crisis.
Boris Johnson talks about the raising temperatures of our planet and the man-made climate change which turned to a crisis.
He erfers to the past and saysays that he was in Copenhagen 11 years ago and in Paris six years ago.
The promises given at these conferences were nothing, he saysays.
His point of view is that the COP26 is the moment when we get real about this issue.
TroughThrough his speech Johnson tries to convince his listeners to act against the climate change.
It is the task to work together and do something.
He says that we have the possiblity to deactivate the ticking doomsday device.
It is not just a possiblity, but also a must.
He intends to be alive in 2060.
So he talks about the future.
If we fail our mission the future children will judge and not forgive us, he saysays.
